author: bobh
msg: - Servlet 2.4, section 10.6 talks about how to handle "Listener Exceptions."
It says a listener exception should cause the error page handling stuff
to be triggered.  This change does that.

author: remm
msg: - Documentation spring cleaning (massive port from TC 4.1).
- Remove docs for non Coyote based connectors (which wouldn't work).

author: luehe
msg: Added init param to configure tag pool size.

author: costin
msg: Update the ant-based startup - instead of the custom ant tasks it now uses
the JMX-based tasks ( that are now available in modeler ). I'm still
investigating embed-startup and setting other properties as well as
dynamic deployment ( based on JMX ), to give ant full control.
